retrofit

Class ChangeableServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrofit.ChangeableServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Endpoint
    Deprecated. 
    Implement Endpoint to change URL and name at runtime. This class will be removed in version 1.5.

    @Deprecated
public class ChangeableServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Endpoint
    An Endpoint whose URL and name can be changed at runtime.
